discourse_list.title: Wednesday and Thursday 9pm CEST DVC Meeting, topics and links

content.content: Hey everyone, it’s time for this weeks Endgame DVC meetings. The overall focus this week will be to continue the discussion about the practicalities of clustering workforce and transitioning core units and other resources into the MetaDAOs if the Endgame Plan is approved and into its Pregame phase. We will discuss this both at today’s call, and tomorrow’s call. In addition, during todays Wednesday call I will start by going through various replies and comments that have been made here on the forum that I haven’t had time to reply to yet, but that I think provide some useful perspectives to better describe the details of the Endgame Plan and its underlying principles Wednesday 9pm CEST Endgame DVC meeting: Launch Meeting - Zoom Q&A of various forum posts and recent feedback, and continue the clustering discussion. Thursday 9pm CEST Endgame DVC meeting: Launch Meeting - Zoom Continue the clustering and transition discussion started last Thursday.

I look forward to the discussion on clustering the workforce. The demand from the workforce to launch CUs continues to grow, while governance is looking to take a more active role in oversight and budgets. Better organization is going to be essential to address this.
Hello all. The call links is: Join Zoom Meeting https://us02web.zoom.us/j/89326394914
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
